name: IT Survivor
description:
Survive Stephen King's It while adventuring through the sewers of Derry, Maine. Collect different objects significant to the losers club including 1) Rock-from the Rock war; 2) Postcard- That Ben wrote a poem on for Bev; 3) Coin - From the Arcade; 4)Eddie's Cast - (Loser/Lover Cast); 5) S.S. Georgie! 

Defeat Pennywise and collect every memorable item to claim victory!

Controls 

A - shoot left 

S - shoot right

Left/Right Arrows - Move

Space - Jump
